group_1.narration: Well then, let's look for a place @together...for the two of us.
A place where we can spend @a lifetime without regret.
I knew that just being with @him wouldn't suddenly make@me find myself, or lift the heavy@fog around future me, but...
If it wasn't just me, but the@two of us together, then...
Maybe I could trust myself to step@onto the unsteady trampoline floor...
With him...@I could float along like@a bubble in the breeze,@exploring places I'd never been.
"Mr. Kasugai was in an accident...@You were the only contact of his @that we could get through to."

group_1.textRight: You going there won't solve anything.

group_1.textLeft: Why...?@Why won't you let me just go?!
It's not like it will do any harm...@Please just let me go!

group_1.textRight: You're not even related. There's no@need for you to get caught up in this!

group_1.textLeft: He might die!@This might be my last chance...!
I don't want him to go alone...

group_1.textRight: Do you have a wish you want granted?
